snippet: Two members of the Metropolitan Museum of Art have sued the museum, contending that it misleads the public into thinking that its admission fees - $25 for adults, and less for seniors and students - are mandatory and not simply suggested.
abstract: Two members of the Metropolitan Museum of Art have sued the museum, contending that it misleads the public into thinking that its admission fees - $25 for adults, and less for seniors and students - are mandatory and not simply suggested.

headline.main: Met Museum Is Being Sued Over Admission Fees
headline.print_headline: Met Museum Is Sued Over Admission Fees
